shortDescription: QuickMaths is a fast-paced mental arithmetic game that challenges your calculation skills with timed exercises and customisable difficulty settings.
longDescription:
QuickMaths is a fast-paced mental arithmetic game that challenges your calculation skills with timed exercises and customisable difficulty settings.

Key Features:

  • Five game modes: addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, and "Which Sign?" (identify the missing operation)
  • Customisable difficulty: adjust number ranges and frequency to match your skill level
  • Flexible timer options: choose from 30 seconds to 5 minutes
  • Comprehensive statistics: track 70+ performance metrics including accuracy, speed, consistency, and progression trends
  • Visual analytics: detailed charts and graphs showing your improvement over time
  • Game history: review all your past sessions with detailed question-by-question breakdowns
  • Personal best tracking: monitor your high scores across all game types
  • Clean, distraction-free interface optimised for focused practice
  • Fully offline: no internet connection required, all data stored locally on your device

Perfect for:

  • Students looking to improve their mental maths skills
  • Anyone wanting to sharpen their calculation abilities
  • Teachers seeking engaging practice tools for their students
  • People who enjoy quick, challenging puzzle games
  • Anyone who wants detailed insights into their mathematical performance

Privacy Note: QuickMaths operates entirely offline and does not collect, transmit, or store any personal data online. All progress, scores, and statistics are stored locally on your device using Core Data. No analytics, tracking, or user data is shared with third parties.
